- gathers Wool{cr}- needs Sheep Pasture{cr}- needs Sheep
- gathers Grain{cr}- needs Grain Fields{cr}- Grain Fields don't grow in winter
- gathers Honeycombs{cr}- needs Beehives{cr}- Beehives don't produce in winter

root.string: Elias prides himself on both his honesty and his ability to drive a hard bargain.{cr}{cr}Passive ability: {cr}Gets better trade prices{cr}{cr}Active ability: {cr}Can provide hungry Settlers with Food

Alandra has a strong faith and prides herself on her medical knowledge.{cr}{cr}Passive ability: {cr}Collection after sermon increases{cr}{cr}Active ability: {cr}Can heal ill Settlers{cr}{cr}Bonus: {cr}Has sligthly increased health points

Marcus is a young knight, who has risen up through the ranks to attain this lofty position. {cr}{cr}Passive ability: {cr}Recruiting batallions costs less{cr}{cr}Active ability: {cr}Can supply his troops with Torches{cr}{cr}Bonus: {cr}Has sligthly increased health points

Hakim is a master of the desert. He is wise in his knowledge of construction and in the art of persuasion.{cr}{cr}Passive ability: {cr}Upgrading buildings costs less resources{cr}{cr}Active ability: {cr}Can convert a nearby enemy Battalion

Kestral grew up in the wild. Her father was a self-styled Bandit King.{cr}{cr}Passive ability: {cr}Bonus on tax collection{cr}{cr}Active ability: {cr}Can plunder City Buildings' Earnings{cr}{cr}Bonus: {cr}Allows recruiting of bandits in barracks

Thordal is a Narlindir skald, known for both his lusty battle songs and his odes to love. {cr}{cr}Passive ability: {cr}More Settlers find a spouse at the festival{cr}{cr}Active ability: {cr}Can sing to entertain the Settlers{cr}{cr}Bonus: {cr}Has sligthly increased attack power and allows recruiting of vikings in barracks

string.Comments: The Thief has the ability to find out what City Reputation the player has who owns the territory the Thief is standing on.{cr}"- is able to impair and spy on other Factions"{cr}is a summarization of:{cr}"- can steal information from enemy Castle{cr}- can steal Resources from enemy Storehouse{cr}- can sabotage enemy Cathedral{cr}- descries other Factions' City Reputation"{cr}Those details are in the Abilities_U_Thief key.

string.Comments: KoBo: Is "assembles into" correct? It's a cart that can be ordered to assemble itself (well, there are no soldiers required for the process) into a Siege Engine.
